Generation II.Gold: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
Generation II.Silver: It is hard for it to support its own weight out of water, so it gets down on all fours. But it moves fast.
Generation II.Crystal: Although it has a massive body, its powerful hind legs enable it to move quickly, even on the ground.
Generation II.Stadium 2: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It is hard for it to support its own weight out of water, so it gets down on all fours. But it moves fast. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
